channel.title: Thrilling Adventure Hour
channel.copyright: All characters and concepts are copyright Ben Acker & Ben Blacker
channel.description: The Thrilling Adventure Hour is a staged show in the style of old-time radio performed by your favorite stars from the worlds of television, film, comedy, sketch, animation, and the stage. It is created and written by Ben Acker and Ben Blacker. For more information, tickets to the live show, and pretty pictures, please visit ThrillingAdventureHour.com.

item.title: #186: Jefferson Reid, Ace American, “Return to Castle Brunholdt”
item.description:
Starring Nathan Fillion as super-soldier Jefferson Reid. Also starring Annie Savage as Agent Abby Adams; Marc Evan Jackson as General Rex Flagwell; Mark Gagliardi as Agent Barrington; Busy Philipps as Marilee Stephens; Jamie Denbo, Melanie Lynskey, Sara Watkins, and Jenny Wade as children; Keegan-Michael Key as Gene Krupa; Craig Cackowski as Herr Doktor Vitus Brunholdt; and Jason Ritter and Colin Hanks as teen sidekicks.

Recorded September 6, 2014 at Largo, Los Angeles

item.title: #185: TAH Panel from New York Comic Con 2014
item.description:
Lots of big news from our NYCC panel! You'll get the full scoop on all of our future projects--and there are a lot of them--here, with TAH creators Ben Acker & Ben Blacker (theirs are the first voices you'll hear), WorkJuice Players Marc Evan Jackson, Paul F. Tompkins, Paget Brewster, Hal Lublin, Craig Cackowski, Mark Gagliardi, and Autumn Reeser, musician and composer Andy Paley, WorkJuice East representatives John Hodgman and Terry Kinney, and our most special of guests, Janet Varney!

Check our website, ThrillingAdventureHour.com for links to tickets to all upcoming LA shows, and go to http://thrillingadventurehour.com/wordpress/comic-books/ to pick up digital-only origin issues of our upcoming comics, Sparks Nevada, Marshal on Mars, and Beyond Belief, both coming in February 2015 from Image Comics!

item.description:
TAH comes to NY in October:

-Oct 8: Nerdist Comics Panel with guests Charles Soule (Death of Wolverine; She-Hulk) and Gerry Duggan (Deadpool)

-Oct 9: Nerdist Writers Panel with guests Danny Strong (Mockingjay Part 1 & 2 The Butler), and Ales Kot (Secret Avengers comic)

-Oct 10: Nerdist Comics Panel with Brian Michael Bendis (Powers; Ultimate Spider-Man)

-Oct 10: TAH Improv show featuring Paul F. Tompkins, Craig Cackowski, Janet Varney, Scott Adsit, Marc Evan Jackson, Hal Lublin, and Donal Logue

item.title: A word on behalf of ourselves (and Night Vale)
item.description:
The Great TAH/Welcome to Night Vale is now available for your ears! Go to http://nightvale.bandcamp.com/ or search iTunes.
And a whole lot of us are coming to NY Comic Con! Go to ThrillingAdventureHour.com for our full schedule of ticketed shows, non-ticketed signings and panels, photo opportunities, and lots more.

Also starring WorkJuice Players Busy Philipps, Craig Cackowski, Autumn Reeser, Annie Savage, Hal Lublin, Paul F. Tompkins, and Paget Brewster. With special guests Tom Lenk, Shannon Woodward, Bill Corbett, Natalie Morales, Mark McConville, Jeremy Carter, and Adam Busch.

Songs by Eban Schletter. Music performed by Eban Schletter with Sara Watkins and Sean Watkins.

Written by Ben Acker & Ben Blacker with guest writers Bill Corbett and Douglas Petrie.

Directed by Aaron Ginsburg.
